title: Grasp of the Undying "steal" Clarification
body: Does it do damage (take from) or just heal you? Eg. would a Shen with 4k hp and Grasp of the Undying get 160 bonus damage and a 160 hp heal, or 160 hp heal?

replies.body: Grasp of the Undying's both damage and a heal.
Yeah, does it also imply that the heal is reduced by enemy resistances?
Does that also mean the heal is reduced by resistances?

Can I just say this keystone is why I love the resolve tree?

{{champion:14}}: Your life is mine!
